item.title: What is Genetic Algorithm
item.author: gycggd@gmail.com (Guo, Yuchen)
item.description: 开始 生物上的遗传与进化 It is not the strongest of the species that survive, but the one most responsive to change. -Charles Darwin 达尔文所说的这句“物竞天择，适者生存”，指的是一个种群的基因会经过环境的挑选，使
